customMethods.name: cleanForm
customMethods.script:
self.parent.getChild("FlexContainer Basic").getChild("FlexContainer Left").getChild("ProviderName").props.params.inputText = ""
	self.parent.getChild("FlexContainer Basic").getChild("FlexContainer Left").getChild("Address").props.params.inputText = ""
	self.parent.getChild("FlexContainer Basic").getChild("FlexContainer Left").getChild("State").props.params.inputText = ""
	self.parent.getChild("FlexContainer Basic").getChild("FlexContainer Left").getChild("Zip").props.params.inputText = ""
	
	self.parent.getChild("FlexContainer Basic").getChild("FlexContainer Right").getChild("LocationDesc").props.params.inputText = ""
	
	self.parent.getChild("FlexContainer Contact").getChild("FlexContainer Left").getChild("Phone").props.params.inputText = ""
	self.parent.getChild("FlexContainer Contact").getChild("FlexContainer Left").getChild("Email").props.params.inputText = ""
	
	self.parent.getChild("FlexContainer Contact").getChild("FlexContainer Right").getChild("ContactName").props.params.inputText = ""
	self.parent.getChild("FlexContainer Contact").getChild("FlexContainer Right").getChild("ContactPhone").props.params.inputText = ""
	self.view.params.provId = 0

customMethods.name: setOptions
customMethods.script:
query = """
SELECT [id]
	,[providerTypeName]
FROM [RITIOps].[organization].[ProviderType]
WHERE providerTypeName NOT IN ('Presenter-Volunteer','Insurance')
ORDER BY [providerTypeName]
	"""
	
	result = system.db.runPrepQuery(query,[],'RITIOps')
	
	# Version 1 set options as list of dictionaries
	self.props.params.options = [ dict(value = x[0],label = x[1]) for x in result]

	# Version 2 set options as dataset
	#self.props.params.options = result

config.script:
root = self.view.getChild("root")
	lblMessage = self.getSibling("lblMessage")
	_providerId = self.view.params.providerInfo.get('providerId')
	
	
	system.perspective.print(('_save providerId ',_providerId ))

	_validationMsg = root.getValidationMessage()
	if _validationMsg:
		lblMessage.showMessage(_validationMsg)
		return
	
	system.perspective.print(('_validationMsg: ', _validationMsg))
	try:
		if isinstance(_providerId, (int, long)) and _providerId > -1:
			root.updateProviderDb(_providerId)
		else:
			self.view.params.providerInfo['providerId'] = root.insertProviderDb()
			
	except:
		lblMessage.showMessage("Something went wrong while saving data. Please try again.")
		raise				
	
	else:		
		system.perspective.closeDock("SearchProvider")
		system.perspective.closeDock("RegisterProvider")	
		system.perspective.sendMessage('refreshProviderTableFromFilter')

customMethods.name: showMessage
customMethods.script:
import time
	self.props.text = message
	self.meta.visible = True
	time.sleep(5)
	self.meta.visible = False

customMethods.name: insertProviderDb
customMethods.script:
query = """
INSERT INTO [organization].[Provider]
		([providerName]
		,[street]
		,[city]
		,[state]
		,[zipCode]
		,[providerTypeId]
		,[locationDescription]
		,[phone]
		,[email]
		,[website]
		,[contactName]
		,[contactPhone]
		,[timeRetired]
		,[timeCreated])
	     VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
"""
	_dictComp = self.getDictComponents()
	args = []
	args.append(_dictComp['providerName'].props.params.inputText)
	args.append(_dictComp['street'].props.params.inputText)
	args.append(_dictComp['city'].props.params.inputText)
	args.append(_dictComp['state'].props.params.inputText)
	args.append(_dictComp['zipCode'].props.params.inputText)
	
	args.append(_dictComp['providerTypeId'].props.params.selectedValue)
	
	args.append(_dictComp['locationDescription'].props.params.inputText)
	
	args.append(_dictComp['phone'].props.params.inputText)
	
	args.append(_dictComp['email'].props.params.inputText)
	args.append(_dictComp['website'].props.params.inputText)
	args.append(_dictComp['contactName'].props.params.inputText)
	args.append(_dictComp['contactPhone'].props.params.inputText)
	
	_timeRetired = None if _dictComp['active'].props.selected else system.date.now()
	args.append(_timeRetired)
	
	args.append(system.date.now())

	#errors = False  # A flag to denote if we ran into a problem with a query during the transaction
	
	#system.perspective.print(('insertDb:', query.replace('\n',' ').replace('\t',' '), args))

	
	idInserted = -1
	system.perspective.print(('insertDb:', args))
	idInserted = system.db.runPrepUpdate(query,  args, 'RITIOps',getKey=1)
	system.perspective.print(('idInserted :', idInserted))

customMethods.name: updateProviderDb
customMethods.script:
query = """
DECLARE @id INT = ?

UPDATE [organization].[Provider]
SET  [providerName]= ?
	,[street]= ?
	,[city]= ?
	,[state]= ?
	,[zipCode]= ?
	,[providerTypeId]= ?
	,[locationDescription]= ?
	,[phone]= ?
	,[email] = ?
	,[website]= ?
	,[contactName]= ?
	,[contactPhone]= ?
	,[timeRetired]= ?
WHERE [id] = @id
"""

	_dictComp = self.getDictComponents()
	args = []
	args.append(self.view.params.providerInfo.providerId)
	
	args.append(_dictComp['providerName'].props.params.inputText)
	args.append(_dictComp['street'].props.params.inputText)
	args.append(_dictComp['city'].props.params.inputText)
	args.append(_dictComp['state'].props.params.inputText)
	args.append(_dictComp['zipCode'].props.params.inputText)
	
	args.append(_dictComp['providerTypeId'].props.params.selectedValue)
	
	args.append(_dictComp['locationDescription'].props.params.inputText)
	args.append(_dictComp['phone'].props.params.inputText)
	args.append(_dictComp['email'].props.params.inputText)
	args.append(_dictComp['website'].props.params.inputText)
	args.append(_dictComp['contactName'].props.params.inputText)
	args.append(_dictComp['contactPhone'].props.params.inputText)

	_isActive = _dictComp['active'].props.selected
	_timeRetiredDb = _dictComp['active'].props.timeRetiredDb
	
	if _isActive == True:
		args.append(None)
	else:
		if _timeRetiredDb:
			# In the case that provider was not active before edit and stays still inactive, old retiredDate will be saved,
			args.append(_timeRetiredDb)
		else:
			args.append(system.date.now())

	
	system.perspective.print(('updateDb:', args))

	system.db.runPrepUpdate(query,  args, 'RITIOps')

customMethods.name: YupdateProviderDb
customMethods.script:
query = """
DECLARE @id INT = ?

UPDATE [organization].[Provider]
SET  [providerName]= ?
	,[street]= ?
	,[city]= ?
	,[state]= ?
	,[zipCode]= ?
	,[providerTypeId]= ?
	,[locationDescription]= ?
	,[phone]= ?
	,[email] = ?
	,[website]= ?
	,[contactName]= ?
	,[contactPhone]= ?
	,[timeRetired]= ?
WHERE [id] = @id
"""

	queryWithoutTimeRetired = """
DECLARE @id INT = ?

UPDATE [organization].[Provider]
SET  [providerName]= ?
	,[street]= ?
	,[city]= ?
	,[state]= ?
	,[zipCode]= ?
	,[providerTypeId]= ?
	,[locationDescription]= ?
	,[phone]= ?
	,[email] = ?
	,[website]= ?
	,[contactName]= ?
	,[contactPhone]= ?
WHERE [id] = @id
"""


	_dictComp = self.getDictComponents()
	args = []
	args.append(self.view.params.providerInfo.providerId)
	
	args.append(_dictComp['providerName'].props.params.inputText)
	args.append(_dictComp['street'].props.params.inputText)
	args.append(_dictComp['city'].props.params.inputText)
	args.append(_dictComp['state'].props.params.inputText)
	args.append(_dictComp['zipCode'].props.params.inputText)
	
	args.append(_dictComp['providerTypeId'].props.params.selectedValue)
	
	args.append(_dictComp['locationDescription'].props.params.inputText)
	args.append(_dictComp['phone'].props.params.inputText)
	args.append(_dictComp['email'].props.params.inputText)
	args.append(_dictComp['website'].props.params.inputText)
	args.append(_dictComp['contactName'].props.params.inputText)
	args.append(_dictComp['contactPhone'].props.params.inputText)

	_isActive = _dictComp['timeRetired'].props.selected
	_isDeactivated = _dictComp['timeRetired'].props.isDeactivated
	
	if _isActive == True:
		args.append(None)
	else:
		if _isDeactivated == True:
			args.append(system.date.now())
		else:
			# In case that provider is not active, but selection is not changed don't update timeRetired. (use query without timeRetired, don't add arg, )
			query = queryWithoutTimeRetired

	
	system.perspective.print(('updateDb:', query.replace('\n',' ').replace('\t',' '), args))

	system.db.runPrepUpdate(query,  args, 'RITIOps')

customMethods.name: XupdateProviderDb
customMethods.script:
query = """
UPDATE [organization].[Provider]
SET  [providerName]= ?
	,[street]= ?
	,[city]= ?
	,[state]= ?
	,[zipCode]= ?
	,[providerTypeId]= ?
	,[locationDescription]= ?
	,[phone]= ?
	,[email] = ?
	,[website]= ?
	,[contactName]= ?
	,[contactPhone]= ?
	,[timeRetired]= ?
WHERE [id] = ?
"""
	args = self.getArgValues() + [providerId]
	#errors = False  # A flag to denote if we ran into a problem with a query during the transaction
	
	
	system.perspective.print(('updateDb:', query.replace('\n',' ').replace('\t',' '), args))

	try:       
		txId = system.db.beginTransaction(timeout=5000)
		system.db.runPrepUpdate(query,  args, 'RITIOps', tx=txId)   
		system.db.commitTransaction(txId)  
		system.db.closeTransaction(txId)
	except:
		system.db.rollbackTransaction(txId)
		system.db.closeTransaction(txId)
		raise
		#errors = True

customMethods.name: XgetArgValues
customMethods.script:
_dictComp = self.getDictComponents()
	
	_argKeys = [ 
		'providerName'
		,'street'
		,'city'
		,'state'
		,'zipCode'
		,'providerTypeId'
		,'locationDescription'
		,'phone'
		,'email'
		,'website'
		,'contactName'
		,'contactPhone'
		,'timeRetired'	]
	
	
	argValues = []	
	for key in _argKeys:
	
		if key == 'timeRetired':
			timeRetired = None if _dictComp[key].props.selected else system.date.now()
			argValues.append(timeRetired)	
		elif 'inputText' in _dictComp[key].props.params:
			if _dictComp[key].props.params.inputText is None:
				argValues.append('')
			else:
				argValues.append(_dictComp[key].props.params.inputText)
		elif 'selectedValue' in _dictComp[key].props.params:
			argValues.append(_dictComp[key].props.params.selectedValue)	
		else:
			argValues.append(None)

	return argValues
	
	_x = """
	_dict = {}
	flexBasic = self.getChild("FlexContainer Basic")
	_dict['providerName'] = flexBasic.getChild("FlexContainer Left").getChild("ProviderName").props.params.inputText
	_dict['street'] = flexBasic.getChild("FlexContainer Left").getChild("Street").props.params.inputText
	_dict['state'] = flexBasic.getChild("FlexContainer Left").getChild("State").props.params.inputText
	_dict['city'] = flexBasic.getChild("FlexContainer Left").getChild("City").props.params.inputText
	_dict['zipCode'] = flexBasic.getChild("FlexContainer Left").getChild("ZipCode").props.params.inputText
	_dict['locationDescription'] = flexBasic.getChild("FlexContainer Right").getChild("LocationDescription").props.params.inputText
	_dict['providerTypeId'] = flexBasic.getChild("FlexContainer Right").getChild("ProviderTypeId").props.params.selectedValue
	
	flexContact = self.getChild("FlexContainer Contact")
	_dict['email'] = flexContact.getChild("FlexContainer Left").getChild("Email").props.params.inputText
	_dict['phone'] = flexContact.getChild("FlexContainer Left").getChild("Phone").props.params.inputText
	_dict['contactName'] = flexContact.getChild("FlexContainer Right").getChild("ContactName").props.params.inputText
	_dict['contactPhone'] = flexContact.getChild("FlexContainer Right").getChild("ContactPhone").props.params.inputText
	_dict['website'] = flexContact.getChild("FlexContainer Left").getChild("Website").props.params.inputText
	_dict['active'] = flexContact.getChild("FlexContainer Right").getChild("Active").props.selected
	
	# Correction for phone
	_dict['phone'] = ''.join([s for s in phone if s.isdigit()])
	_dict['contactPhone'] = ''.join([s for s in contactPhone if s.isdigit()])
	
	argValues = [_dict.get(key) for key in self.getArgKeys()]
	
	return argValues"""

customMethods.name: setFormComponents
customMethods.script:
system.perspective.print(('AAA111'))
	emvHeader = self.getChild("emvHeader")
	
	_dictComp = self.getDictComponents()
		
	_dictComp['providerTypeId'].setOptions()

	providerId = kwargs.get('providerId')

	system.perspective.print(('providerId:',providerId))
	
	if providerId is not None and providerId > -1:
		emvHeader.props.params.text = 'Edit Provider'

		pyds = self.getProviderDb(providerId)


		_dictComp['providerTypeId'].props.params.selectedValue = pyds[0]['providerTypeId']
		
		_dictComp['active'].props.selected = True if pyds[0]['timeRetired'] is None else False
		_dictComp['active'].props.timeRetiredDb = pyds[0]['timeRetired']			
		
		_dictComp['providerName'].props.params.inputText = pyds[0]['providerName']
		_dictComp['providerName'].props.params.editEnabled = True
		
		_dictComp['street'].props.params.inputText = pyds[0]['street']
		_dictComp['street'].props.params.editEnabled = True		
		
		_dictComp['state'].props.params.inputText = pyds[0]['state']
		_dictComp['city'].props.params.inputText = pyds[0]['city']
		_dictComp['zipCode'].props.params.inputText = pyds[0]['zipCode']
		_dictComp['locationDescription'].props.params.inputText = pyds[0]['locationDescription']

		_dictComp['email'].props.params.inputText = pyds[0]['email']
		_dictComp['phone'].props.params.inputText = pyds[0]['phone']
		_dictComp['contactName'].props.params.inputText = pyds[0]['contactName']
		_dictComp['contactPhone'].props.params.inputText = pyds[0]['contactPhone']
		_dictComp['website'].props.params.inputText = pyds[0]['website']	

	else:
		emvHeader.props.params.text = 'Register Provider'

		_dictComp['providerTypeId'].props.params.selectedValue = None
		
		_dictComp['active'].props.selected = True
		_dictComp['active'].props.timeRetiredDb = None		
		
		_dictComp['providerName'].props.params.inputText = kwargs.get('providerName')
		_dictComp['providerName'].props.params.editEnabled = False
		
		_dictComp['street'].props.params.inputText = kwargs.get('street')
		_dictComp['street'].props.params.editEnabled = False
		
		_dictComp['state'].props.params.inputText = ''
		_dictComp['city'].props.params.inputText = ''
		_dictComp['zipCode'].props.params.inputText = ''
		_dictComp['locationDescription'].props.params.inputText = ''

		_dictComp['email'].props.params.inputText = ''
		_dictComp['phone'].props.params.inputText = ''
		_dictComp['contactName'].props.params.inputText = ''
		_dictComp['contactPhone'].props.params.inputText = ''
		_dictComp['website'].props.params.inputText = ''

customMethods.name: getProviderDb
customMethods.script:
query = """
SELECT 
	 [id]
	,[providerName]
	,[street]
	,[city]
	,[state]
	,[zipCode]
	,[providerTypeId]
	,[locationDescription]
	,[phone]
	,[email]
	,[website]
	,[contactName]
	,[contactPhone]	
	,[timeRetired]
FROM [RITIOps].[organization].[Provider]
WHERE [id] = ?
"""
	
	result = system.db.runPrepQuery(query,[providerId], 'RITIOps')
	
	return result

customMethods.name: getDictComponents
customMethods.script:
_dictComp = {}
	flexBasic = self.getChild("FlexContainer Basic")
	flexContact = self.getChild("FlexContainer Contact")
	
	_dictComp['providerName'] = flexBasic.getChild("FlexContainer Left").getChild("ProviderName")
	_dictComp['street'] = flexBasic.getChild("FlexContainer Left").getChild("Street")
	_dictComp['state'] = flexBasic.getChild("FlexContainer Left").getChild("State")
	_dictComp['city'] = flexBasic.getChild("FlexContainer Left").getChild("City")
	_dictComp['zipCode'] = flexBasic.getChild("FlexContainer Left").getChild("ZipCode")
	_dictComp['locationDescription'] = flexBasic.getChild("FlexContainer Right").getChild("LocationDescription")
	_dictComp['providerTypeId'] = flexBasic.getChild("FlexContainer Right").getChild("ProviderTypeId")
	_dictComp['active'] = flexBasic.getChild("FlexContainer Right").getChild("Active")
	
	_dictComp['email'] = flexContact.getChild("FlexContainer Left").getChild("Email")
	_dictComp['phone'] = flexContact.getChild("FlexContainer Left").getChild("Phone")
	_dictComp['contactName'] = flexContact.getChild("FlexContainer Right").getChild("ContactName")
	_dictComp['contactPhone'] = flexContact.getChild("FlexContainer Right").getChild("ContactPhone")
	_dictComp['website'] = flexContact.getChild("FlexContainer Left").getChild("Website")

	return _dictComp

customMethods.name: getValidationMessage
customMethods.script:
import re

	_dictComp = self.getDictComponents()
	
	_providerName = _dictComp['providerName'].props.params.inputText
	_street = _dictComp['street'].props.params.inputText
	_state = _dictComp['state'].props.params.inputText
	_zipCode = _dictComp['zipCode'].props.params.inputText
	_providerTypeId = _dictComp['providerTypeId'].props.params.selectedValue
	_phone =_dictComp['phone'].props.params.inputText
	_contactPhone = _dictComp['contactPhone'].props.params.inputText
	
	_patternPhone = re.compile("^[0-9]{3}-[0-9]{3}-[0-9]{4}$", re.IGNORECASE)

	
	if not(_providerName) or unicode(_providerName).strip == '':
		validationMsg = "Provider name is mandatory!"
	
	elif not(_street) or unicode(_street).strip == '':
		validationMsg = "Address is mandatory!"
	
	elif not(_state) or unicode(_state).strip == '':
		validationMsg = "State is mandatory!"
	
	elif not(_zipCode) or unicode(_zipCode).strip == '':
		validationMsg = "Zip code is mandatory!"
	
	elif _providerTypeId is None or _providerTypeId == -1:	
		validationMsg = "Provider type is mandatory, select!"

	elif _phone and _patternPhone.match(_phone) is None:
		validationMsg = "Provider phone must be in format ***-***-**** "	
		
	elif _contactPhone and _patternPhone.match(_contactPhone) is None:
		validationMsg = "Contact phone must be in format ***-***-**** "	
	else:
		validationMsg = ''
	
	return validationMsg
